Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent of the Amazon rainforest fires by using images of burned animals that are not directly related to the fires.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide evidence or sources to back up the assertion that the photos are from the Amazon rainforest fires.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photos of burned animals are directly related to the August 2019 wildfires in the Amazon Rainforest, without providing sufficient evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim suggests that the photos may depict animals killed in forest fires in other parts of the world or may have been taken in the Amazon years before the latest fires, indicating alternative explanations for the images.
